addressLine1.description: The first address line for each location. Only queryable when provided in conjunction with name.

addressLine2.description: The second address line for each location. Only queryable when provided in conjunction with name.

city.description: The city of each location. Only queryable when provided in conjunction with name.

region.description: The region of each location. This is often the state or province. Only queryable when provided in conjunction with name.

regionCode.description: The region code of each location. Only queryable when provided in conjunction with name.

postalCode.description: The postal or ZIP code for each location. Can accept Zip + 4 or Zip. Only queryable when provided in conjunction with name.
